form.p: This template is used to create a Remote Service Implementation project.
During project creation with this template, the apipackage/plugin
containing the ExampleRemoteService class declaration must be provided
so that the compile-time references to ExampleRemoteService can be
resolved. The apipackage/plugin name given should already exist in
the workspace, and may be easily created by using the Remote Service
API project template. Once created, the new project will have a
class implementing ExampleRemoteService with OSGi Remote Services
service properties for exporting as a remote service.
